backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removal of newsletter signup bar and statistics section from CallToActionSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component purposes, styling, and recent changes including the FounderExpertiseSection addition.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with MOBIUS-NOVA title and Montserrat font import from Google Fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that renders the LandingPage component.
Two-column benefits section displaying six value propositions with Nova Gold check icons, Cosmic Blue hover effects, and uppercase headings.
frontend/src/components/CallToActionSect: Call-to-action section with email signup form and gradient button, with newsletter text and statistics previously removed per feature requirements.
Features section displaying six capability cards in a grid, leading with Multi-Modal Single Core technology and using MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with MOBIUS-NOVA branding, social media links, navigation columns, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/FounderExpertise: Centered section displaying pilot partnership messaging with 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' headline and pre-commercial prototype stage subheading using brand styling.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component displaying the MOBIUS-NOVA logo, tagline, hero content with CTA buttons, and animated background gradients with scroll-to-features functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor instance, switching between authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks when backend integration is needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives, MOBIUS-NOVA brand color definitions using OKLCH color space, custom utility classes, and dark theme configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component that composes all sections (Hero, Features, Founder Expertise, Benefits, CTA, Footer) with dark gradient background.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors in OKLCH format, Montserrat font family, container settings, custom animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document containing brand guidelines, architectural notes, feature history, and requirements for the MOBIUS-NOVA landing page.
